mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM, BOARD_NO, TITLE, NICKNAME, CRE_DATE, RECOMMEND_COUNT, HITS FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, BOARD_NO, TITLE, NICKNAME, CRE_DATE, RECOMMEND_COUNT, HITS FROM (SELECT B.BOARD_NO AS BOARD_NO, B.CONTENTS AS CONTENTS, B.TITLE AS TITLE , M.NICKNAME AS NICKNAME, B.CRE_DATE AS CRE_DATE , B.RECOMMEND_COUNT AS RECOMMEND_COUNT, B.HITS AS HITS FROM BOARD B, MEMBERS M WHERE B.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO ORDER BY B.BOARD_NO DESC) WHERE TITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR CONTENTS LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR NICKNAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' ORDER BY RECOMMEND_COUNT DESC, BOARD_NO ASC ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT B.BOARD_NO, B.TITLE, B.CONTENTS, B.MEMBER_NO, M.NICKNAME, B.CRE_DATE, B.MOD_DATE, B.RECOMMEND_COUNT, B.HITS
FROM BOARD B, MEMBERS M WHERE B.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO AND B.BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
mapper.insert:
SELECT BOARD_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO BOARD (BOARD_NO, MEMBER_NO, TITLE, CONTENTS, CRE_DATE, MOD_DATE, RECOMMEND_COUNT, HITS) VALUES(#{boardNo}, #{memberNo}, #{title}, #{contents}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, 0, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT B.CONTENTS AS CONTENTS, B.TITLE AS TITLE, M.NICKNAME AS NICKNAME FROM BOARD B, MEMBERS M WHERE B.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO ORDER BY B.BOARD_NO) WHERE title LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or contents LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or nickname LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
mapper.insert:
SELECT HITS_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO HITS (HITS_NO, BOARD_NO, MEMBER_NO, CRE_DATE) VALUES(#{hitsNo}, #{boardNo}, #{memberNo}, SYSDATE)

INSERT INTO TB_FILE (IDX, PARENT_SEQ, ORIGINAL_FILE_NAME, STORED_FILE_NAME, FILE_SIZE, CRE_DATE) VALUES (TB_FILE_IDX_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{parentSeq}, #{original_file_name}, #{stored_file_name}, #{file_size}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT IDX, ORIGINAL_FILE_NAME, STORED_FILE_NAME, ROUND(FILE_SIZE/1024, 1) AS FILE_SIZE FROM TB_FILE WHERE PARENT_SEQ = #{no}
